shape.description: Shape of the volume. For level units use the StatusEffectSettings component instead!

enemies_only.description: [bool]If set the effect only applies to enemies.

node.description: [string]Node in the unit to link the custom volume to. Not used if Actor.

inner_parameters.description: For spheres & circles, radius in X. For OOBBs and rectangles, the extent of the box in local space. Not used if Actor.

outer_parameters.description: For spheres & circles, radius in X. For OOBBs and rectangles, the extent of the box in local space. Not used if Actor.
